page.title: 13LIFE STYLES
page.content: USK AND RURAL AREA - LIFE STYLE Apart from the farmers, most people travel from the area to work, some families owning two cars. Young children are taken to nursery schools and playgroups in Usk, and weekly bulk shopping is done in nearby towns. the school children are bussed to Usk and Caerleon and are away all day, taking a snack midday lunch, returning home to a family meal in the evening. Milk is delivered daily in Usk and 4 times weekly in the rural area. No Sunday delivery. There is one public house in Gwehelog "The Hall Inn" which serves bar lunches and restaurant meals to passers-by as well as being the "local" for nearby residents. Most club, leisure activities and Adult Education takes place in Usk or Raglan. This is a quiet and pleasant area in which to live, and
